lead_paragraph: Cheryl Ford set a postseason record with 23 rebounds for the Detroit Shock in a 70-59 victory over the Connecticut Sun in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Cheryl Ford set a postseason record with 23 rebounds for the Detroit Shock in a 70-59 victory over the Connecticut Sun in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.
